articles.title: Forget the Dustbuster — Dyson is releasing its most powerful handheld vacuum ever, and it costs less than $300
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Car+Boat Handheld Vacuum, a cordless vacuum designed for cleaning pets, bedding, cars, and boats. It features a 110,000 RPM motor, offering powerful suction and a 50-minute runtime, and incorporates fully-sealed filtration capable of trapping 99.99% of dust and allergens.

articles.title: Our Sleep Experts Found The 9 Best Mattresses For Platform Beds
articles.author: Alexandra Garrett
articles.summary: The article features different mattresses from different brands for platform beds. Nectar Luxe is a good option overall; Brooklyn Bedding CopperFlex is the best affordable option. Winkbeds Luxury Hybrid is the best hybrid option.

articles.title: Microsoft was right with Surface Duo: Two screens are better than one
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Microsoft launched the Surface Duo, a dual-screen Android smartphone, aiming to innovate the mobile market. Despite its unique design and focus on productivity, the Surface Duo line was discontinued after two generations due to software issues and market skepticism towards its dual-screen approach, contrasting with the emerging foldable phone trend.

articles.title: WWE and Tubi Shake the Entertainment World with WWE EVOLVE Launch
articles.author: Pragya Chowdhury
articles.summary: WWE and Tubi have launched a new series, WWE EVOLVE, on Tubi's streaming service. The series will showcase rising stars from the WWE Performance Center and the WWE ID program, providing viewers with high-octane wrestling action each week, starting March 5th.

articles.title: Samsung's Tri-Fold Phone Name Leaked Online: Expected Launch Date Revealed
articles.author: Newsd
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its tri-fold phone, potentially named the Galaxy G Fold, as early as January next year. The phone is expected to have a 9.96-inch screen when unfolded and a 6.54-inch screen when folded, using an inward-folding design. Samsung plans to produce around 300,000 units of the Galaxy G Fold.

articles.title: Lambos Digital Unveils Cutting-Edge Programmatic Ad Platform to Empower Local Advertisers and Ad Agencies
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Lambos Digital launched its new programmatic advertising platform. This platform is designed to help local businesses and ad agencies maximize their advertising impact.

articles.title: Google Search widget now lets you set a shortcut on Android
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google has introduced customizable shortcuts within the Google Search widget, expanding its functionality for Android users. This update, previously exclusive to Pixel devices, now enables users to personalize their search experience by providing quick access to features like Weather, Lens, and Song Search directly from their home screen, streamlining tasks and boosting productivity. This represents a shift towards a more interactive, personalized, and proactive search experience, with developers playing a role in creating innovative widgets.

articles.title: The best Valentine's Day flower delivery services of 2025
articles.author: Amanda Garrity
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers, FTD, ProFlowers, and Teleflora are Valentine's Day flower delivery services that prioritize freshness and quality. These services utilize local florists to fulfill orders, and while they attempt to match colors and flower varieties, exact matches are not guaranteed.

articles.title: Sip the spirit of tradition: Mandarin Oriental Hong Kong welcomes Lunar New Year with cocktails inspired by Chinese philosophy
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Mandarin Oriental Hong Kong launched "The Mandarin," a limited-edition spirit crafted with Two Moons Distillery, to mark its 60th anniversary. The Aubrey bar also introduced a new cocktail collection based on the Japanese philosophy of "Kaizen," featuring eight signature cocktails with traditional Japanese ingredients.

articles.title: Here's How Mayonnaise and Miracle Whip Are Different, According to the Government
articles.author: Andee Gosnell
articles.summary: Kraft-Heinz's Miracle Whip, first introduced by Kraft (then Kraft-Phenix Cheese Corporation) at the 1933 World's Fair in Chicago, is marketed as a cheaper alternative to mayonnaise. It is made from soybean oil, high-fructose corn syrup, vinegar, eggs, spices, and water. The product comes in Original, Light, and 'Mayo-Like' varieties.

articles.title: OnePlus 13R review: Feature-rich flagship phone without premium price-tag
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: OnePlus 13R features a solid build, good display, and camera supported by generative AI. It offers long battery life with fast charging at less than half the price of ultra-premium phones.

articles.title: This Cleaning Device Zaps Germs From Toothbrushes, Retainers And More. It's On Sale Today.
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: An ultrasonic cleaner is available on Amazon for $42.99 after discounts. It uses vibrations, water, and UV lights to clean retainers, mouth guards, toothbrush heads, and dentures. The device has multiple cleaning modes and is ultra-quiet.

articles.title: Pre-order delivery of Samsung's flagship S25 series begins in Hyderabad
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung has begun delivering pre-ordered Galaxy S25 series smartphones in Hyderabad, following its official launch on January 22nd in San Jose. The Galaxy S25 series introduces features like Galaxy AI, a Provisual Engine, and improved gaming capabilities with prices for the S25 Ultra starting at Rs 1,29,999 and the base S25 model at Rs 80,999.

articles.title: Aldi launches exclusive Valentine's Day range
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its Valentine's Day range, a new line of food and drinks that includes starters, mains, sides, desserts, and alcoholic beverages. The range features items like heart-shaped pizzas and pasta, wagyu pies, and specially selected desserts, available in stores starting February 10.

articles.title: Meta's Threads Starts Showing Ads
articles.summary: Meta Platforms has introduced advertisements to its Threads app in the United States and Japan, starting with a limited test phase. Advertisers can extend their Meta ad campaigns to Threads through Ads Manager, utilizing AI-powered brand safety controls similar to Facebook and Instagram. The goal is to ensure that ads are relevant and engaging for users.

articles.title: The first ever native iPhone porn app, Hot Tub, arrives in the EU via the approved alternative app store AltStore PAL, which was made possible by the DMA (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Hot Tub, the first native iPhone porn app, has launched in the EU through the AltStore PAL. This alternative app store became available due to Europe's Digital Markets Act.

articles.title: Honor X9c: Unbreakable AI smartphone touches down in Mzansi
articles.author: Honor South Africa
articles.summary: Honor has launched the Honor X9c smartphone, featuring an anti-drop display, AI-enhanced photography, and a 6600mAh battery with 66W SuperCharge. The phone is available in Titanium Black and Jade Cyan, with pricing starting at R10 999.

articles.title: iPhone prices keep going up, but this smartphone is a fraction of the price AND a fraction of the size
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: The NanoPhone, a credit card-sized Android smartphone, is available for $99.97 until February 23rd. It features Dual SIM support, a 5MP rear camera, a 2MP front camera, and comes with a case and screen protector. The NanoPhone is designed to provide essential smartphone functionality in a compact and affordable package.

articles.title: Ultimate Increased Confidence Or Performance With Spider Sense Male Enhancement
articles.summary: Spider Sense Male Enhancement is introduced as a daily dose gummy product aimed at improving male sexual health. It is marketed towards men of all ages, highlighting its affordability and different purchasing options. The product manufacturer emphasizes a commitment to both quality and safety.

articles.title: Make Valentine's Day special with these Bath & Body Works perfumes
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works offers a variety of perfumes including Rose, Beautiful Day, Gingham, At The Beach, and In The Stars. Each perfume features unique fragrance notes such as floral, fruity, woody, and musky scents, catering to different preferences. The eau de parfums range from about $20 to $50, while the fine fragrance mists usually range from $12 to $14.

articles.title: This Convenient Digital Picture Frame Is 50% Off On Amazon
articles.author: Marquaysa Battle
articles.summary: A digital picture frame with a touchscreen and 32GB storage is available. The frame allows sharing of photos and videos via a free app and works on Wi-Fi. Users can upload images that immediately appear on the frame's screen.

articles.title: New Look's £20 dress 'suits any occassion' and 'flatters your figure'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Belted Crinkled Mini Shirt Dress for £20, which is currently on sale with over 30% off. The dress has received positive reviews for its comfortable fit and flattering design, with an average rating of 4.5 out of five stars on New Look's website. New Look offers also other styles of shirt dresses.

articles.title: 'Flattering' and 'versatile' New Look dress that 'hangs beautifully' reduced to £20
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: New Look is offering a belted dress for £20, available in several colors. Shoppers have praised its quality, comfort, and versatility for various occasions, though some noted potential issues with length and fabric. The dress is available in multiple sizes, with some already sold out.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans to love new Ninja Air fryer dupe with window as it hits middle aisle – it's €80 cheaper than real deal
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching a new Ambiano air fryer, a dupe of the Ninja Deluxe Air Fryer MAX PRO, priced at €49.99 with 12 cooking functions and several accessories. Lidl Ireland is also introducing a Vileda Spray and Clean Mop, which requires no bucket and features an adjustable spray mist and removable water tank.

articles.title: This Vacuum Might Be The ‘Best Invention Since The Cordless Telephone' — And It's $100 Off Today
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: The Shark cordless vacuum is reviewed, emphasizing its effectiveness in cleaning pet hair and reaching difficult areas. It features a 60-minute battery life, 'powerfin nozzles' for deep cleaning, and a lightweight design. Customer reviews highlight its suction power and ease of use, even comparing it favorably to Dyson models.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy new ‘robot' dupe with 5 modes that will keep house clean – it's €120 cheaper
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has launched a new robot vacuum cleaner as a more affordable alternative to the Eufy Hybrid Robot Clean L60 Vacuum. The robot features include multiple cleaning modes, app control, automatic room mapping, self-charging, and is available in stores nationwide from February 10.

articles.title: Heard of 'Offers Zone' on Flipkart? If not, read on
articles.summary: Flipkart introduced an updated search tool within its app that allows users to search via text, voice, or image. It also focused on simplified cart additions and checkout along with features to track orders and to receive price-drop notifications.

articles.title: The Best Alternatives for Telegram
articles.author: NE NOW NEWS
articles.summary: Telegram client applications such as Nicegram, Plus Messenger, Telegram X, BGram, and Graph Messenger are introduced as alternatives to the official Telegram app. These clients offer enhanced features like advanced privacy settings, improved user experience through customization options, and advanced group management tools catering to different user needs and preferences.

articles.title: DEV.co Launches Redesigned Website Built on Next.js, Marking a New Era of Performance and Scalability
articles.summary: DEV.co has launched a redesigned website built on Next.js and hosted on Vercel, replacing their previous WordPress platform. The update aims to enhance speed, security, scalability, and user experience by leveraging server-side rendering and static site generation. This transition represents a move towards modern web development methodologies and future-proofing the business.

articles.title: Walmart's bestselling $180 nightstand is on sale for only $43, and buyers say it's 'perfectly priced and sized'
articles.author: Adam Reeder
articles.summary: Walmart offers a 76% discount on one of its bestselling nightstands. This promotion aims to attract customers with a significant price reduction on a popular furniture item.

articles.title: Movate Unveils Movate SalesEdge: Revolutionizing Revenue Growth with AI-Powered, Human-Led Sales Services
articles.summary: Movate launched Movate SalesEdge, a rebranded revenue services portfolio that integrates TSD Global's sales capabilities with Movate AI solutions. Movate SalesEdge offers a unified ecosystem for end-to-end sales services, aiming to streamline sales operations and maximize sales ROI.  The company also provides an Incubation Center for AI-Infused Sales, empowering businesses to refine and scale AI-driven sales strategies.

articles.title: ADMANITY CEO Brian Gregory Announces Worldwide YES PAK 30-Day Free Trial Giving Those Who Take The Free YES TEST, Access To YES PRESS, YES QUEST, YES CONNECT, YES MEDIA And Other YES PAK B2B Tools.
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: ADMANITY has launched a 30-day no-cost trial for its YES PAK suite of B2B marketing tools, accessible after taking the YES TEST. The YES PAK includes tools like YES PRESS, YES Quest, YES MEDIA, VIDEO VAULT, and YES CONNECT. Following the trial, users can continue with a half-price discount, saving $1,200 per year.

articles.title: Stock up and save! Get $20 when you spend $80 worth of P&G household essentials
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a free $20 credit to Prime members who spend $80 on select P&G products. Prime members can utilize Amazon's Subscribe & Save feature to set up recurring deliveries of P&G essentials, such as paper towels and laundry detergent, with savings up to 15%.

articles.title: Microsoft Phone Link will soon make it easier to move on from your old phone
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing an upgrade to the Phone Link app in Windows that simplifies the process of unlinking connected phones (both iPhone and Android) directly from Windows Settings. This update aims to streamline the experience of switching mobile devices, potentially saving users time and effort. Another feature currently in testing is an iPhone info panel to match the one for Android devices, which can be viewed right inside the Start menu

articles.title: How to Pre-Order The Samsung Galaxy S25 Series
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series in Kenya on January 22, 2025. This new phone is described as an all-AI phone, aiming to provide natural and context-aware mobile experiences. The Galaxy S25 series introduces seamless action across apps.

articles.title: "Structural capacity challenge drives MSP Onions to build second autonomous sorting plant"
articles.summary: MSP Onions is launching construction plans for a new facility called MSP Platinum, building upon the technology of their existing MSP Gold facility. MSP Platinum will focus on retail and red onions, operate autonomously using Eqontrol software, and aim for 99.9% accuracy in optical grading of onions. The company has partnered with Burg Machinery for engineering to ensure gentle product handling.

articles.title: ReBrand PR Reveals How to Launch a Profitable PR Agency in 2025 (Zero Experience Needed)
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: ReBrand PR has launched a white-label platform, empowering entrepreneurs to launch PR agencies with AI-driven content creation and a global network of publications.  To celebrate its launch, ReBrand PR is offering a free AI content generator and exclusive publication access for new users.

articles.title: ReBrand PR Unveils Revolutionary Platform: How to Start a PR Company in 2025 (No Experience Needed)
articles.summary: ReBrand PR has launched a tech-enabled white-label digital PR platform that allows entrepreneurs to launch PR agencies. The platform offers AI-driven content creation, access to a network of publications, and automated backend infrastructure. Future plans include AI-powered video PR tools, expansion into emerging markets, and crypto-native payments.

articles.title: Slick Audi estate has electric pace
articles.author: Bill Mccarthy
articles.summary: Audi introduced the A6 Avant 50 TFSI e quattro 299PS S line S tronic, a plug-in hybrid estate car featuring a 14.4 kWh battery allowing up to 56 miles of electric range. The model includes the latest MMI system with touchscreen, smartphone connectivity, infotainment and navigation. The car is priced at £62,995 and achieves 0-62mph in 6.3 seconds.

articles.title: 19 Ways To Make Your Home Look Cleaner Than It Is In 2025
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: TS Designs offers reusable Swiffer duster heads, a home product, available on Etsy. Birthdate Co., launched in 2019, creates customized astrological candles and books. Several other companies offer new products for home cleaning and organization, including Screen Mom's streak-free screen cleaner, Hefty's tear-resistant trash bags, Happy Earth Boutique's eucalyptus toilet cleaning bombs, ChomChom Roller's reusable pet hair remover, Microfiber Wholesale's high-quality cleaning products, Therapy Clean's plant-based stainless steel cleaner, and electric wine opener.

articles.title: New Nalgene Surrealist Bottle Collection Merges Dreamlike Art with Sustainable Hydration
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nalgene Outdoor launched its Surrealist Collection, a limited-edition series of 32 oz Wide-Mouth water bottles featuring surrealist designs. These bottles are made in the USA from BPA/BPS-free material derived from 50% waste plastic and are available for $17.99 at www.nalgene.com and select retailers.

articles.title: Lip Lab coming to Logan Circle
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: Lip Lab's goods are now available. An opening date for Lip Lab will be announced soon.

articles.title: Fairy laundry deal sees 'effective' washing pods fall to 19p each
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Fairy laundry detergent pods are being promoted for their stain removal capabilities, suitability for sensitive skin due to its non-bio formula, and pleasant fragrance. Customer reviews highlight positive experiences, mentioning effective stain removal and gentle formula, while some have reported issues with stain removal on tougher stains.

articles.title: Samsung revolutionises mobile experience with AI
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, featuring enhanced AI capabilities and the Snapdragon® 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy chipset. The Galaxy S25 series includes a processor boosting NPU by 40%, CPU by 37%, and GPU by 30% compared to previous generations. To make the Galaxy S25 affordable, Samsung is partnering with financial institutions to offer interest-free payment plans.

articles.title: AI Text Generator Market Boosts Context Algorithms By USD 1,808 million by 2032, CAGR at 18%
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: The AI Text Generator Market is experiencing growth, with recent developments including the launch of Canva Docs as a versatile platform and Pepper Content Pvt. Ltd.'s introduction of a new AI text generator based on GPT-3. These launches and the broader market growth underscore the increasing demand for efficient and high-quality content creation solutions.

articles.title: At $105,000, Is This 2006 Rolls-Royce Phantom A Sublime Steal?
articles.author: Rob Emslie
articles.summary: BMW initiated a new model, Phantom, leveraging a traditional Rolls Royce name. The new model's styling proved that BMW hadn't monkeyed with the marque's secret sauce, but that styling masked a ton of technology and convenience features previously unobtainable to Rolls buyers. When new, the Phantom charted a new path for Rolls-Royce while reestablishing the marque as the epitome of luxury and attainment.

articles.title: Chamber of Commerce celebrates grand opening of Smart & Clean Laundromat
articles.author: Staff report
articles.summary: Smart & Clean Laundromat, a new state-of-the-art laundromat equipped with washers and dryers, opened in Moncks Corner. The laundromat offers various amenities including drop-off service and free Wi-Fi and is open daily from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m.

articles.title: Daisy Sour Cream Dips Can Help Add Big Flavor to the Big Game
articles.summary: Daisy Brand introduced Daisy Sour Cream Dips, a blend of herbs and spices with Daisy Sour Cream. The dips are available in two flavors: French Onion and Creamy Ranch.

articles.title: Get your winter skincare routine sorted with these Elizabeth Arden products - now better than half price
articles.author: Natalie Dixon
articles.summary: Elizabeth Arden is offering discounted prices on its skincare products. Deals include 66% off the Visible Difference Refining Moisture Cream Complex, 55% off the Visible Difference Replenishing HydraGel Complex, 53% off the Visible Difference Eye Cream, and 45% off the Nourishing Skin Essentials Eight Hour 3-Piece Gift Set.

articles.title: Winter skincare routine sorted with Elizabeth Arden beauty
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Elizabeth Arden is offering discounts on several skincare products. These include the Visible Difference Refining Moisture Cream Complex, Visible Difference Replenishing HydraGel Complex, Visible Difference Eye Cream, and the Nourishing Skin Essentials Eight Hour 3-Piece Gift Set. These offers are available for a limited time on Amazon.

articles.title: The Best Dry Irons for Effortless Ironing—Top Picks for 2025
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: The article introduces four dry iron models: Wipro Elato GD203, Crompton ACGEI-BRIO, Nova Plus NI 46, and BAJAJ Majesty DX 6. Each iron offers unique features such as non-stick soleplates, temperature control, and ergonomic designs to provide efficient and convenient ironing experiences for different user preferences.

articles.title: https://pills-spider-sense-male-enhancement.jimdosite.com/
articles.summary: Spider Sense Male Enhancement is introduced as a daily supplement for men aiming to enhance sexual function. It is marketed with reasonable pricing and flexible purchasing options. The manufacturers emphasize quality and safety.

articles.title: Spider Sense Male Enhancement:Quality and safety strengthens belief in the product.
articles.summary: Spider Sense Male Enhancement is marketed as a daily dose for male sexual health in gummy form. It is accessible due to its reasonable price and multiple purchase options. The company emphasizes safety and quality.

articles.title: B&M reduces 1L bottle of luxury body wash worth £20 to only £1.89
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: B&M is offering discounted Russell and Windsor beauty products, including Rose Spritzer Bath and Shower Gel, Rosemary and Mint Shower Gel, and Manuka Honey Exfoliating Body Scrub. Additionally, B&M introduced a new chic lamp featuring three dimmable light settings.

articles.title: Viral finds? Here's how to sort by popularity on Meesho
articles.summary: Meesho app introduced a new feature which sorts products by popularity on Android devices. This feature allows users to identify trending products, save time, and discover best deals.

articles.title: 34 Products On Amazon's 'Trending' List That You Probably Haven't Seen Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Laneige introduced a blurring powder for pores. NYX launched a Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum offering 12 hours of hydration. Olay released a Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Maybelline launched the Superfluff Volumizing Brow Mousse. Crest introduced "Sensitive Teeth" 3D Whitestrips. Skoy Scrub, a reusable cleaning product, was also highlighted, along with Owala's "SmoothSip" travel tumbler.

articles.title: Perion Announces Transformational 'Perion One' Strategy, Unifying All of Its Technologies and Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion Network Ltd. has launched its 'Perion One' strategy, unifying the company's brands and technologies into a single platform called 'Perion One'. This new platform will use AI to solve modern marketing challenges and optimize the company's cost structure.

articles.title: Perion Announces Transformational 'Perion One' Strategy, Unifying All of Its Technologies and Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion Network Ltd. has launched 'Perion One', a new platform designed to unify the company's brands and technologies. This AI-powered solution aims to solve modern marketing challenges and optimize the company's cost structure. The 'Perion One' platform will expand upon the technologies of Hivestack, offering CMOs a clearer view across the entire ecosystem.

articles.title: Perion Announces Transformational 'Perion One' Strategy, Unifying All of Its Technologies and Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion has launched Perion One, a unified platform designed to integrate its diversified brands and advanced technologies. This platform provides CMOs and marketing teams with seamless solutions to connect across the media ecosystem. Perion aims to become a premier solutions provider within the industry through this launch.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 UK preorders go live as major retailer lets you skip the launch day rush
articles.author: Lloyd Coombes Gaming Editor
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Switch 2, with a full reveal scheduled for April 2nd. UK retailers such as Currys and ShopTo are allowing prospective buyers to register interest or pre-order for a small fee to get ahead of the launch day rush. These registrations provide early access to news and sales information regarding the new console.

articles.title: To Survive the Retail Media Arms Race, Retailers Must Wrest Back Control From Amazon
articles.author: Adweek
articles.summary: Amazon launched its Retail Ad Service platform into beta at CES. The platform is a cloud-based solution enabling retailers to monetize online traffic by displaying sponsored product ads.

articles.title: Vodafone takes on Samsung with S25 Ultra offer you can't afford to miss
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung is releasing the Galaxy S25 Ultra on February 6th, featuring a slightly new square design with rounded cameras for a consistent look across the S25 series. It includes the new Snapdragon Gen 8 Elite, promising improved battery life compared to the S24 Ultra.

articles.title: Amazon slashes £50 off ghd hair dryer in flash sale
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: GHD Air Hair Dryer is offered at a reduced price of £89.99 on Amazon. This hair dryer features a 2,100W motor, ionic technology, and includes a concentrator nozzle. The product is highly rated by Amazon customers.

articles.title: Perion Appoints Google Veteran Stephen Yap as Chief Revenue Officer
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion is transitioning into AI-powered marketing with technology to enhance efficiency, transparency, and connectivity. Perion's technology aims to empower advertisers, agencies, and retailers to create omnichannel strategies. This allows brands to reach their potential and meet consumer needs.

articles.title: Council Post: How To Reinvent Your Business With AI: A Playbook For SaaS Leaders
articles.author: Ronan Burke
articles.summary: Inscribe AI, along with other B2B SaaS companies like Gong, Notion and Intercom, are introducing AI-driven features and products. These companies are either enhancing existing workflows with AI or pivoting to AI-centric models.  Inscribe AI is embracing AI agents to enhance its offerings and reimagine its capabilities in its industry.

articles.title: NewidHost-Best NVMe SSD VPS40%Off(Linux or Windows) ASIA, US, EU
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Newid Host introduces NVMe SSD VPS hosting services. The company has been serving Asia, US, and Europe markets for over 10 years.

articles.title: Long-term report: The Polestar 2 shows how tech makes a big difference
articles.author: Jack Evans
articles.summary: Polestar 2 features an infotainment system running Android Automotive OS, pre-loaded with apps like Google Maps and Spotify, providing seamless integration with user accounts. Recent switch to a rear-wheel-drive layout and battery optimization resulted in an improved driving experience and extended range. The integration of technology makes the car easy to use.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT, world's first triple-fold smartphone may hit the global market soon
articles.summary: Huawei Mate XT, the world's first triple-fold smartphone, is rumored to launch globally by March 2025. The device features a foldable OLED display that can expand to 10.2 inches, powered by Huawei's Kirin 9010 5G chipset and equipped with a 50-megapixel primary camera and a 5,600mAh battery supporting 66W wired and 50W wireless charging.

articles.title: LG Electronics to launch StanbyME 2 in Korea
articles.author: 집에서 돈 버는 병원마케팅작가 되기
articles.summary: LG Electronics Inc. is launching the 'LG StanbyME 2' in South Korea. This device features a detachable display for increased flexibility, improved screen quality, and extended battery life. The domestic launch price is 1.29 million won ($884.91).

articles.title: Domain and Web Hosting Order Software with Web Hosting Template - only $15 (one time fee)
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is introduced as an affordable alternative to WHMCS for domain and web hosting signup management. The software features an AJAX domain checker with WHOIS lookup, and a single-page shopping cart for streamlined domain and hosting selection.

articles.title: DeepSeek gives Europe's tech firms a chance to catch up in global AI race
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese AI model, is offering its services at a fraction of the cost of OpenAI's ChatGPT, attracting startups due to the ease of migration and significant cost savings. Microsoft has also released OpenAI's o1 reasoning model to all Copilot users for free. These shifts indicate a potential change in the AI market with more accessible and affordable solutions.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 review: Not a big jump, but a refined update over predecessor OnePlus 12
articles.author: Manik K
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 13, starting at Rs 69,999. The device features a 6.82-inch LTPO AMOLED ProXDR display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a triple-camera setup with 50MP lenses, and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. Powered by a 6,000mAh battery and supporting 100W SuperVooc charging, it promises all-day battery life and fast charging.

articles.title: Quick-dry OPI nail polish hailed a 'game-changer' delivers a smudge-proof, glossy finish that lasts - and it's already a shopper favourite
articles.author: LYDIA WHEATLEY
articles.summary: OPI has launched its new RapiDry™ Quick-Dry Lacquers, designed to dry nails in just 60 seconds. This vegan formula comes in various finishes, lasts for five days, and includes a new Rush Brush for faster application. OPI also recommends using RapiDry's Clearly Fast as a base or top coat.

articles.title: Stuck on high cost of lipstick
articles.author: Ellen Warren
articles.summary: High-end labels like Hermès, Gucci, Jimmy Choo, Dolce & Gabbana, and Prada are entering the cosmetics market with products like lipsticks. An all-in-one refillable spray with a microfiber cloth for screen cleaning is available on Amazon.com.

articles.title: BSNL bats for AI-led service quality, 4G handset bundling as it eyes 5G
articles.author: Muntazir Abbas
articles.summary: BSNL has launched BiTV, offering free access to 400+ live TV channels for mobile customers, and Intranet Fibre-Based TV providing 500+ live TV channels for FTTH customers. The company also introduced BSNL national Wi-Fi roaming, enabling seamless connectivity across India. Additionally, BSNL is planning to introduce smart home solutions, SIM card home delivery, AI-based customer support, and is rolling out 4G while strategizing for 5G deployment.

articles.title: SURI – A Modern Revolution in the World of Judaica
articles.author: ADI ACHRAK
articles.summary: Laline introduces the Snow White collection inspired by Disney, featuring cosmetics and accessories in a PEACH & WHITE FLOWERS scent. KÉRASTASE launches the PREMIÈRE series for hair repair and calcium removal, offering a range of products including shampoo and serum. OATLY introduces a sugar-free oat drink in Israel, while Hostess launches Magic Sponge Sheets for stain removal. Impress launches the Heart of Anna jewelry collection.

articles.title: Snag CeraVe, Aesop and more for 30% off with 'innovative' new beauty brand
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Noli has launched an AI-powered platform that offers personalized skincare routines by analyzing skin types, lifestyles, and preferences. The platform utilizes a diagnostic quiz and face scan supported by skincare research to generate a 'BeautyDNA' profile. Noli offers skincare products from brands like La Roche-Posay, Aesop, and Garnier at discounted prices.

articles.title: Gifts for the gals: Our guide to finding the perfect Galentine's Day present
articles.author: Stephanie De Nobile
articles.summary: Benefit offers a multitasker for beauty buffs. CASETiFY launches trendy phone charm. Lorna Jane releases cotton blend crew socks. Who is Elijah introduces a fragrance with mandarin and pear notes. Cotton On is selling pink slippers for cozy nights. Sundae Body promotes a berry-scented shower foam and body whip. Dusk offers a calming candle with lychee and peony notes. Arms of Eve releases a gold-plated chain friendship bracelet. Sephora provides a hydrating body wash. Lanolips releases magnetic lip balm holder.

articles.title: Heinz Is Releasing a New Mustard for the First Time in Almost 10 Years
articles.author: Bailey Fink
articles.summary: Heinz is partnering with DJ Mustard to release its first-ever co-created sauce in the U.S. in 2025. This new mustard product, inspired by DJ Mustard's love for grilling, is currently in development and anticipated to launch in the summer.

articles.title: AI Dominates Super Bowl Ads: What It Means for Small Businesses
articles.author: Elisabeta Qoku
articles.summary: Canva introduces its AI design assistant, enabling small businesses to create professional-quality ads and marketing materials. Various AI-powered platforms and agencies like My Local Design also offer services for AI-driven advertising and sales strategies. These tools and services aim to make AI accessible for marketing and sales.

articles.title: Microsoft finally fixes the most annoying part of Phone Link
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new feature for Phone Link that will allow users to unlink their phones directly from Windows, rather than having to go through their Microsoft account. This streamlines the process of managing connected devices with Phone Link.

articles.title: The best app store on my phone isn't Google Play
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung offers alternatives to Google Play. These alternatives present unique perks within the Samsung ecosystem, potentially indicating new services or features.

articles.title: Creative and PR agency Sunday Gravy nabs Sorbent
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Sorbent has appointed Sunday Gravy agency to expand its reach with Australian consumers. Sunday Gravy launched a new brand platform, Service Still Matters, with Square, designed to remind of the invaluable role human connection plays in customer interactions.

articles.title: The Snacks & Cereals of 2024
articles.author: Jake M
articles.summary: Idahoan launched 'Potato Shreds,' aiming to capture the instant Mac n' Cheese cup market, but it may already be discontinued. Ritter Sport is highlighted as a high-quality chocolate product from a family-owned company. The content also generally discusses new snack and cereal products.

articles.title: Touchless car wash rooted in Henderson community aims to branch out
articles.author: Katie Ann McCarver
articles.summary: Scotty's Car Wash has launched a new, state-of-the-art 24-hour touchless car wash in Henderson, featuring artificial intelligence to optimize chemical usage and ensure consistent quality. The car wash offers a touch-free option using high-pressure nozzles and graphene coatings and plans to expand with more locations in the coming years.

articles.title: ‘Badass Bagels' Is Coming to Burtis Avenue
articles.author: Michael Dinan
articles.summary: Badass Bagels, known for its sourdough bagels, is opening a permanent location at 5 Burtis Ave. They offer unique products such as Hot Honey Pistachio Cream Cheese and Sourdough Pizza Dough, along with sourdough and gluten-free bagels. The bagels are made using a four-day process with a unique sourdough starter.

articles.title: Dongseo Food announced on the 3rd that it has launched a new product called Maxim Mocha Gold Zero Su..
articles.author: a whimsical lake
articles.summary: Dongseo Food launched 'Maxim Mocha Gold Zero Sugar Coffee Mix,' a sugar-free coffee mix using alternative sweeteners like erythritol and polyglycitol to maintain sweetness while adhering to the 'Zero Sugar' standard. The product is available in packs of 20 and 50, priced at 5,250 won and 12,900 won respectively, at large discount stores.

articles.title: DQE Communications announces brand refresh and expanded offerings
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: DQE Communications is undertaking an extensive expansion and brand refresh. This signals a change in market presence and potentially new offerings, suggesting the introduction of new or updated services.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold Review: Google's Best Foldable — With Caveats
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google has a new foldable phone that represents their best effort so far. However, the phone requires too many compromises to match the flagship performance of Samsung and leading Chinese foldable manufacturers.

articles.title: Forget the Dustbuster — Dyson is releasing its most powerful handheld vacuum ever, and it ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Dyson is preparing a new, upgraded version of its Dustbuster, surpassing the capabilities of the existing Humdinger model.

articles.title: Celebrities unite for ‘smoke-free' future
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: ZYN launched three new nicotine pouch variants: Fresh Breeze, Dark Purple, and Espressino. The launch event, ZYN Socials, was held at White Rabbit in Poblacion on January 31st, following an exclusive dinner. These new variants aim to revolutionize enjoyment for legal age nicotine users.

articles.title: ReBrand PR Reveals How to Launch a Profitable PR Agency in 2025 (Zero Experience Needed)
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A new AI-powered platform is launching, designed to help entrepreneurs enter the $25B digital PR market. The platform features automated tools, access to over 5,000 publications, and requires no upfront costs, allowing users to launch a PR company in under 24 hours.

articles.title: The Dyson Airwrap is at its lowest price on Amazon in 30 days — Shop now
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Dyson's Airwrap has achieved household name status and become a highly sought-after item. Its success serves as a case study within the beauty industry, showcasing how a product achieves viral popularity.

articles.title: Family legacy drives new Martinizing Cleaners ownership
articles.author: Staff Report
articles.summary: Martinizing Cleaners has reopened in Flower Mound, offering top-notch service and eco-friendly cleaning. The company focuses on dry cleaning, laundry services, and alterations, providing convenient and sustainable solutions to the Flower Mound community.

articles.title: SBL launches Johnnie Walker Blonde on the market
articles.summary: Seychelles Breweries Limited (SBL) has launched a new whisky product called Johnnie Walker Blonde. The company unveiled the new lighter and milder whisky at its headquarters.
